name: gascop-web
description: A REST interface for the gascop POCSAG paging system

scripts.build: mkdir -p build && rm -rf build/* && cp -r src_js/* build && cp node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.min.js build/public/javascripts/jquery.min.js && cp node_modules/popper.js/dist/umd/popper.min.js build/public/javascripts/popper.min.js && cp node_modules/bootstrap/dist/js/bootstrap.min.js build/public/javascripts/bootstrap.min.js && cp node_modules/bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css build/public/stylesheets/bootstrap.min.css && npm run tsc
scripts.buildWindowsPS: rd -r build; mkdir build; cp -R src_js/* build; cp node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.min.js build/public/javascripts/jquery.min.js; cp node_modules/popper.js/dist/umd/popper.min.js build/public/javascripts/popper.min.js; cp node_modules/bootstrap/dist/js/bootstrap.min.js build/public/javascripts/bootstrap.min.js; cp node_modules/bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css build/public/stylesheets/bootstrap.min.css; npm run tsc
